name: C0D3
description:
NOTE: This game requires a controller for one of the players while the other will use the mouse and keyboard.

This was a project created by myself for my college coursework as part of a project. I produced all the models myself in Maya along with all the code which was done in C#. Unfortunately, due to a lack of time in the project I was unable to add much needed polish and testing as well as sound and particle effects.
